error.message: Call to deprecated method mimeHeaderEncode() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Unicode. Deprecated in drupal:9.2.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use \Symfony\Component\Mime\Header\UnstructuredHeader instead.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
